channel.title: Logout issue
channel.description: Everytime someone in my source logsoff at the dueling arena i get a buch of null errors and they cant logon till the server gets reset. anyone have an idea of what it could be? This is a delta/pi base

item.title: Logout issue
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

EclipseRSPS:

kankur i’m sorry but if you cannot even understand the spoonfeed you were just given gtfo p servers.

What is wrong with you people? This person is only asking for some help and it doesn’t matter if they are completely clueless about Java. Yes, I highly recommend you study some Java before you develop a game, but we don’t encourage people like you posting worthless posts.

OT: I believe that is a player with the method that handles player disconnecting. If you don’t know where to find the method at, I cannot help you because I do not know what base you are using.

Read full topic

im in server help for a reason, cause i obviously need help, dont come to my post telling me what to do, if you have nothing better to do than critisize people on an rsps fourm get a life.

item.title: Logout issue
item.dc:creator: @xXxSkillerxXx xXxSkillerxXx
item.description:
@xXxSkillerxXx wrote:

change the logout method for them, (the logout method in the duelarena.) (EDITED: Ok so i am not 100% sure iether but this is the savecommand for a PI in duel arena

Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(PlayerSave.saveGame(o)) { System.out.println("Game saved for player "+players[i].playerName); } else { System.out.println("Could not save for "+players[i].playerName); } removePlayer(players[i]); players[i] = null; continue; } OHHH AND MAKE URE AT THE VERYY!!! BOTOM OF YOUR playerhandler.java you have this!!![code]plr.saveCharacter = true;
plr.destruct();

}

}[/code]

Read full topic
